TEXT.English: In a stunning vote last night, you recieved the most votes and you won a landslide victory! Congratulations, you've been re-elected!
TEXT.French: Par un vote étonnant la nuit dernière, vous avez obtenu le plus grand nombre de voix et c'est une victoire écrasante! Félicitations, vous avez été réélu!
TEXT.German: Nach einer fantastischen Wahlnacht hast Du die meisten Stimmen erhalten und einen Erdrutschsieg erzielt! Glückwunsch, Du wurdest wiedergewählt!
TEXT.Italian: In a stunning vote last night, you recieved the most votes and you won a landslide victory! Congratulations, you've been re-elected!
TEXT.Spanish: In a stunning vote last night, you recieved the most votes and you won a landslide victory! Congratulations, you've been re-elected!

TEXT.French: Excellent, On retourne au travail à présent...
TEXT.German: Ausgezeichnet, dann wieder ran an die Regierungsgeschäfte...

TEXT.English: In what most critics called a "run of the mill" election last night, you won with %d1 percent of the vote! Congratulations!
TEXT.French: Dans une élection des plus serrées la nuit dernière, vous avez remporté la Victoire avec %d1 pourcent des voix! Félicitations!
TEXT.German: Die meisten Kritker nennen sie eine mittelmäßige Wahlnacht; Du hast mit %d1 der Wählerstimmen gewonnen! Glückwunsch!
TEXT.Italian: In what most critics called a "run of the mill" election last night, you won with %d1 percent of the vote! Congratulations!
TEXT.Spanish: In what most critics called a "run of the mill" election last night, you won with %d1 percent of the vote! Congratulations!

TEXT.English: In the heated election, your opponent, %s1 managed to snatch victory from you with %d1 of the vote!
TEXT.French: Lors de cette élection brûlante, votre adversaire, %s1 a réussi à vous arracher la victoire avec %d1 des voix!
TEXT.German: Nach einem hitzigen Wahlkampf hat Dein Gegner, %s1, es geschafft, Dir den Sieg mit %d1 der Stimmen zu entreißen!
TEXT.Italian: In the heated election, your opponent, %s1 managed to snatch victory with from you with %d1 of the vote!
TEXT.Spanish: In the heated election, your opponent, %s1 managed to snatch victory with from you with %d1 of the vote!

TEXT.English: During last evening nation election, you recieved %d1 percent the of the vote. Fortuantly, your "poll anaylists" were able to interpret an additional %d2 percent of the vote in your favor.
TEXT.French: Durant les élections nationales d'hier soir, vous avez obtenu %d1 pourcent de voix. Heureusement, vos "Analystes" des sondages ont été capable d'interpréter un ajout de %d2 pourcent de votes en votre faveur.
TEXT.German: Bei den Wahlen letzte Nacht hast Du %d1 Prozent der Stimmen erzielt. Zum Glück ist es Deinen "Wahlanalysten" gelungen, %d2 Prozent der Stimmen zu Deinen Gunsten zu interpretieren.
TEXT.Italian: During last evening nation election, you recieved %d1 percent the of the vote. Fortuantly, your "poll anaylists" were able to interpret an additional %d2 percent of the vote in your favor.
TEXT.Spanish: During last evening nation election, you recieved %d1 percent the of the vote. Fortuantly, your "poll anaylists" were able to interpret an additional %d2 percent of the vote in your favor.

TEXT.German: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Du hast Dich geweigert, eine Wahl abzuhalten!"
